content: CFS-CID MD HS Hole saws for metal deck Carbide hole saw for cutting holes for 2”- 4” schedule 40 pipe in corrugated metal deck slabs ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Metal, wood and other material drill bits ### FEATURES:Features Hole saw designed specifically to speed-up installation of cast-in firestop devices in metal deck slabs One-step solution for creating holes in corrugated metal deck to match the penetration diameter of cast-in firestop devices Eliminates the need for torches, plasma cutters or core rigs when making openings for firestopped penetrations in metal deck Applications Cutting openings in corrugated metal deck to run pipes or conduits Available in three custom sizes to fit CFS-CID MD 2, 3 and 4 cast-in firestop devices ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2205140 - Metal deck. hole saw CFS-CID MD HS 2 - Package Size 18 pc - 2205141 - Metal deck. hole saw CFS-CID MD HS 3 - Package Size 20 pc - 2205142 - Metal deck. hole saw CFS-CID MD HS 4 - Package Size 1 pc
